SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
COMMERCE MARKETPLACE
Installation and Setup Tasks

Perform these one-time installation and setup tasks before you move on to the more specific tasks in the rest of this guide.

Prerequisites
Before you begin, verify that you meet some of the prerequisites.
Install the Managed Package
Quickly install the Managed Package using the URL for your org.
Create and Configure an Integration User
If you’re using a storefront integration like the Marketplace Integration Toolkit, create and configure a user for integration tasks. Otherwise, you can skip this task.cally.
Assign Admin Permissions
Quickly assign the admin permission for your Marketplace.
Enable Experience Builder and Workspaces
Quickly enable Experience Builder and Workspace.
Create the Seller Portal Digital Experience
Create the seller portal using Salesforce’s Digital Experience tools. A digital experience is a website that you can customize using components and templates. Components are available to include features for communication, collaboration, data sharing, file sharing, and more.
Enable Self-Registration for Sellers
By enabling the self-registration for sellers, you have less tasks to perform. After sellers self-register, you only have to track their progress and approve their registration.
Configure Access to Flows
By configuring the access to flow, you can determine which users can view your Marketplace flows.
Enable Reports
You can quickly enable reports to establish a record of your activities.
Configure Import Settings
To allow sellers to import data, configure the sharing settings.
Add Data Sharing Rules
Add data sharing rules that govern how sellers can interact with Commerce Marketplace objects.
Change the Running User for Dashboards
Quickly change the running user for Dashboards.
Configure Page Layouts
This task involves a lot of manual configuration, but it is necessary because these objects are linked to a profile and not a permission, so the page layout configuration can’t be automated.
Create Multiple Marketplaces
You can deploy multiple Marketplaces in your Commerce Marketplace app. Each Marketplace can be linked to a webstore through the Salesforce Commerce integration, or to a site configuration through an ecommerce integration.

title: Installation and Setup Tasks for Commerce Marketplace
